programme.title: Woman Of The Photographs
programme.desc: A skilled digital photographer begins a twisted romance with a woman suffering from body dysmorphia.

programme.title: For The Sake Of Vicious
programme.desc: An overworked nurse returns home to find a maniac hiding out with a bruised and beaten hostage.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 2
programme.desc: From the mysterious mutilation of the black dahlia up to the 2017 Delphi murders, no stone is left unturned in Dread: The Unsolved; A mysterious docuseries from Dread Central.

programme.title: Ditched
programme.desc: Desperate to escape an overturned ambulance, a group of paramedics discover that they are the victims of an ambush.

programme.title: Benny Loves You
programme.desc: Jack, a man desperate to improve his life throws away his beloved childhood plush, Benny. Its a move that has disastrous consequences when Benny springs to life with deadly intentions!

programme.title: Imitation Girl
programme.desc: When an alien takes the form of an adult film star, both must learn to cope with the complexities of being human in this mesmerizing film festival favorite. Lauren Ashley Carter plays the dual role of Julianna and the alien.

programme.title: Radius
programme.desc: Liam wakes from a car crash at the bottom of a deep ditch with no memory of who he is. As he makes his way into town, he discovers that anyone who comes within a 50-foot radius of him dies instantly. Out of options, he tries to live in seclusion to protect others until the day a woman comes up to him and doesn’t die in his presence.

programme.title: The Fare
programme.desc: Harris, a world-weary taxi driver, and his fare, Penny, find themselves trapped in an endlessly looping ride that changes their lives forever.

programme.title: Assassinaut
programme.desc: A team of four teenage astronauts brave the alien wilderness of a distant planet to save the Earth’s President from a deadly assassin.
